name: search-index-getter
description: A lib for retrieving individual documents from a search-index corpus

scripts.test: rm -rf test/sandbox && mkdir test/sandbox && standard && tape test/node-test.js
scripts.test-browserify: rm -rf test/sandbox && mkdir test/sandbox && browserify test/browserify-test-uncompiled.js > test/sandbox/bundle.js && tape test/selenium-test.js

author: Fergus McDowall
